description:
The game have 3 difficulty levels starting from 15 to 160 puzzle pieces. Game designed for everyone, from the smallest to the older players!

- 40 Cozy Puzzles
- 3 Types Of Difficulty (15 / 40 / 160 pieces)
- 3 Categories (Animals, Fairy Tales, Adventures)
- Touchscreen Support
- Relaxing Music

Let's start enjoying the amazing puzzle collection!
name: Puzzle Collection
intro: Puzzle Collection - is a relaxing puzzle game where you can spend a lot of time.  Assemble puzzles piece by piece.
